titles.title: Object Of My First Desire (nice easy fit)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Object of my first desire Jesus crucified for me All to happiness asspire Only to be found in Thee Thee to praise And Thee to know Constitute our bliss below Thee to see and Thee to Love Constitute our bliss above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord it is not life to live If Thy presence Thou deny Lord if Thou Thy presence give 'Tis no longer death to die Source and Giver of repose Only from Thy smile it flows Peace and happiness are Thine Mine they are if Thou art mine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}While I feel Thy love to me Every object teems with joy Here O may I walk with Thee Then into Thy presence die Let me but Thyself possess Total sum of happiness Real bliss I then shall prove Heaven below And heaven above{/lang-eng}
